an9.52:1.2: Kittavata nu kho, avuso, khemam vuttam bhagavata”ti?
an9.52:2.1: “Idhavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.52:2.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, khemam vuttam bhagavata pariyayena …pe….
an9.52:3.1: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati, pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
an9.52:3.2: Ettavatapi kho, avuso, khemam vuttam bhagavata nippariyayena”ti.
